channel.title: Everybody's Talking Therapy
channel.description: Recent content on Everybody's Talking Therapy

item.title: About
item.author: emma.fackelmann@gmail.com (Emma Fackelmann)
item.description: I have worked in the mental health field for the last eight years and throughout many diversities/personal experiences my career development has allowed me to develop into the practitioner I am today. I stay true to my genuine and unconditionally supportive values, which center around: automonmy authenticity growth passion empathy I hold a safe space for those who are ready to understand and explore themselves .

item.title: In a Crisis
item.author: emma.fackelmann@gmail.com (Emma Fackelmann)
item.description: I am not a crisis responder and my services are focused on assisting clients that are not ctively experiencing suicidal tendencies. In a crisis…
